name: PERCNOPS VIRTUAL RIG
description:
Take the gaming experience to a whole new level and bring your favorite PC games to VR, simply connect your HMD to your pc and use your VR controllers to handle one of the virtual rigs to emulate racing wheels, yokes and game specific controllers.

Play your games without a need for game specific patches or mods and enhance immersion with appropriate rigs and virtual simulators.

Enjoy the level of optimisation that allows for use of the app with low spec PCs, discover (and rediscover) the latest titles and the classics under the light of VR.

In the current version, the user can pick an environment, a hand model, a virtual gamepad or a Virtual steering wheel Rig with a number of options, this already allows to enjoy a huge variety of PC games and car racing games, but we aren't planning to stop at that, on a regular basis, we are planning to unveil patches, extra features (game specific mappings; fine tuning of gamepad settings) and DLCs bringing immersive Virtual Rigs for Cars, Motorbikes, Boats, Planes, Helicopters and everything in between, on a quest to unlocking the most rewarding VR gameplay experiences.

Disclaimer : footage of third party games has been used for compatibility demonstration, and suggest no affiliation or collaboration nor are those games included in the product.
